Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Batons may not seem particularly calamitous, but they have been the undoing of several American 4x100-meter relay teams at recent Olympics and world championships.
snippet: Batons may not seem particularly calamitous, but they have been the undoing of several American 4x100-meter relay teams at recent Olympics and world championships.
